titles.title: MP950 Thy way, not mine, O Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thy way, not mine, O Lord,
However dark it be Lord.
Oh, lead me by Thine own right hand,
Choose Thou the path for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Smooth let it be or rough,
It will be still the best;
Winding or straight, it can but lead
Right onward to Thy rest.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
The kingdom that I seek
is Thine; so let the way
that leads to it beThine,
else I surely go astray.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Take Thou my cup, and it
With joy or sorrow fill,
As ever best to Thee may seem;
Choose Thou my good or ill.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Choose Thou for me my friends,
my sickness or my health;
choose Thou my cares for me,
my poverty or wealth.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Not mine, not mine the choice
In things or great or small;
Be Thou to me my Guide, my Strength,
My Wisdom and my All.
